metadata.name: Blooming HOPE!
metadata.description:
Peace, and hope for a better future is everyone’s desire. Hope is always possible until the seconds one stops believing. Hope is a beautiful light into the deepest darkness. It is far away, yet too close for humans to understand that conflict and war will bring them nowhere and will give them nothing but regret. 

Hope has different faces and concepts, but here and now for me, in the midst of a war and pandemic, with an unknown future, it shall bloom exponentially and peacefully as the sun shines on the galaxy.

"Blooming HOPE" is an NFT Project designed by KIX & Mozhdeh | oïio, 03.03.2022.


1280x1280 Pixel, 25fps, 8 second.
